## Notes

* '''''BENEFIT:''''' -10 [Deflection](/deflection/) for 10.0 second on damaged targets from your Pike attacks. This pairs well with a Barbarian's [Carnage](/carnageDeadfire/) ability if you want decent damage and support for your tanky type from taking damage. Multi-classing a Barbarian with a Paladin ([Fanatic](/fanatic/)) can make for a decent offensive support if you have a tank already and want this weapon modal.
* '''''PENALTY:'''''  -25% Damage from your Pike attacks.
